data.message: For fucks sakes why are these losers that all of a sudden hate Eminem because he offended them still here rambling? You don't like him..well boo hoo.. then get off his fucking page morons. The fact that you all stayed so you can call him names like a bunch of children proves you have no life and get your jollies off telling him he's a has been and irrelevant. Well news flash, he doesn't care what you think and you are irrelevant. Now unsub your sorry asses. No one wants too hear your whining.
